page_summary: Marketing cover page for Mezzo windows by Alside, showcasing their window product line with the tagline 'Aesthetics and Technology...Redefined'. The page features a large lifestyle photograph demonstrating the windows in an elegant sunroom setting.
key_points: Product name: Mezzo windows
Brand: Alside
Tagline: Aesthetics and Technology...Redefined
Product appears to be vinyl or composite windows with traditional styling

page_summary: Marketing page for Mezzo Windows by Alside, emphasizing quality, elegance, energy efficiency, and American craftsmanship. The page highlights the company's 70+ years of industry excellence and their commitment to custom-made windows manufactured in the USA.
key_points: Mezzo Windows combines elegant style with energy efficiency and strength
Each window is custom-made to fit window openings precisely
Alside has more than 70 years of industry excellence
Products are Made in America, supporting American jobs and economic growth
Customer happiness is prioritized as part of their legacy of leadership and trust

images.description: A golden retriever dog looking out through a window, demonstrating the window product in use
images.relevance: Lifestyle image showing the window product in a relatable home setting with a pet

images.description: Interior living room scene showing windows with natural light, featuring a brown sofa, decorative vases, and martini glasses on a table
images.relevance: Showcases Mezzo Windows installed in an elegant home interior, demonstrating the aesthetic appeal and natural lighting

page_summary: Product specification page for Mezzo Windows detailing various proprietary features and technologies including EdgeForce narrowline frame, CoreFX composite reinforcement, Defense-Tek locking system, Forecaster sloped sill, HP3 telescoping sill, Gatekeeper sash-to-sill interlock, and Ocular screen bulb seal. The page also shows additional frame options and triple-pane glass availability.
key_points: EdgeForce narrowline frame provides larger glass area for better daylighting with internal chambers for structural integrity and energy efficiency
CoreFX composite reinforcement is non-conductive for superior thermal performance and secure hardware mounting
Defense-Tek secure locking system features end-of-throw cam shift locking action with visual indicator for unlocked windows
Forecaster true sloped sill provides efficient drainage without weep holes
HP3 telescoping sill offers three-fold protection: air/water infiltration protection, structural stability, and enhanced beauty
Gatekeeper sash-to-sill interlock technology with three layers of weatherstripping for extreme weather protection
Ocular screen bulb seal aids installation/removal and blocks insect access
Additional frame options available: 1-3/8" Nail Fin Set Back and J-Channel Adaptor
Triple-pane insulated glass option available for enhanced energy efficiency
Double-hung base model auto-upgrades to ST (steel reinforcement) for units over 48" wide or 84" high

images.description: Detailed cross-section cutaway diagram of Mezzo window showing internal construction, frame components, chambers, and various proprietary features
images.relevance: Primary technical illustration showing the window's construction and how all the described features integrate together

images.description: Three installation/frame option images showing 1-3/8" Nail Fin Set Back, 1-3/8" Nail Fin Set Back with J-Channel Adaptor, and Triple-Pane glass option
images.relevance: Shows additional frame and glass upgrade options available for the Mezzo Windows product line

page_summary: Product page for Mezzo windows highlighting key performance and design features including fusion-welded construction, dual-pane glass, insulating chambers, seals, vent stops, and hidden screen tracks.
key_points: Fully fusion-welded frame and sash corners provide superior strength and clean, low-profile finish
Dual-pane, double-strength glass increases strength, durability and insulation
Airtight insulating chambers enhance thermal performance and durability
Dual bulb seals create tighter seal between lower sash and sloped sill (double-hung and single-hung only)
Dual vent stops allow limited window opening for ventilation (not available on single-hung or single-sliding)
Hidden screen track creates clean-line design with half screens standard and full screens optional

images.description: Header lifestyle image showing woman near a window
images.relevance: Marketing imagery establishing the product context and aesthetic appeal

images.description: Series of cross-section diagrams showing window frame construction details including fusion-welded corners, dual-pane glass, insulating chambers, dual bulb seals, vent stops, and hidden screen track
images.relevance: Technical illustrations demonstrating the key engineering features and construction quality of Mezzo windows

page_summary: This page from Mezzo Windows promotes their high-performance glass packages designed to maximize energy savings year-round. It details two glass package options (ClimaTech and ClimaTech ThermD) featuring Low-E insulating glass and argon gas, plus an enhanced cavity foam insulation option that uses graphite-infused polystyrene for superior thermal protection.
key_points: Windows are roughly 80% glass, making glass selection critical for energy efficiency
Low-E (low-emissivity) insulated glass helps with year-round energy savings
ClimaTech combines Low-E glass, argon gas, and Intercept Warm-Edge Spacer System
ClimaTech ThermD features Stainless Steel Intercept Warm-Edge Spacer for greater thermal efficiency
Enhanced cavity foam option uses silver-gray graphite granules in expanded polystyrene (EPS)
Graphite foam reflects radiant heat and lowers thermal conductivity
Lower U-Factor means greater energy savings and better resistance to heat flow
Mezzo Windows are custom-made with various frame and glass options
Available in single-hung, double-hung, sliding and picture windows
No additional wall construction required compared to stock windows

images.description: Person bundled up in winter clothing (knit hat and sweater) appearing cold
images.relevance: Visual representation of winter cold that energy-efficient windows help protect against

images.description: Two seasonal energy savings diagrams showing how Low-E glass works - winter scene showing heat reflection back into home, and summer scene showing solar heat being blocked
images.relevance: Illustrates the dual-season benefits of Low-E insulating glass technology

images.description: Cross-section image of window frame showing silver-gray enhanced cavity foam insulation
images.relevance: Shows the graphite-infused foam insulation technology that provides greater thermal protection

page_summary: This page promotes Mezzo Windows' ENERGY STAR certification and energy efficiency features. It explains the ENERGY STAR program, shows climate zone requirements across the US, and provides a thermal performance comparison chart for different glass package options.
key_points: Mezzo Windows meet or exceed stringent ENERGY STAR requirements
ENERGY STAR is a government-backed voluntary partnership program sponsored by the U.S. EPA and Department of Energy
Windows are available with various glass packages tailored to specific climate zones (Northern, North-Central, South-Central, Southern)
Lower U-Factor means less energy needed to heat your home
Lower Solar Heat Gain Coefficient (SHGC) means more conservation on air-conditioning
Glass options include Clear Glass, ClimaTech, ClimaTech Elite, ClimaTech ThermD, and ClimaTech ThermD TG2 Elite
Mezzo Windows meet ASTM (American Society for Testing and Materials) test methods for Air, Water, and Structural Loads performance
Products are tested for quality and safety to globally recognized standards

images.description: ENERGY STAR Partner certification badge showing Mezzo meets stringent ENERGY STAR performance requirements
images.relevance: Demonstrates official ENERGY STAR certification and credibility of the product

images.description: US map showing four climate zones (Northern, North-Central, South-Central, Southern) with color-coded regions and legend
images.relevance: Helps customers identify their climate zone to select appropriate glass packages for optimal energy efficiency

page_summary: Product page for Mezzo Double-Hung Windows featuring their classic design, functionality, and key technical features. The page emphasizes the windows' style, easy cleaning capability with tilt-in sashes, and various structural benefits.
key_points: Classic double-hung style with contemporary elegance and clean lines
Both sashes tilt in for easy cleaning from inside the home
Constant force balance system eliminates sash cords, weights and pulleys
Narrowline frame and sashes with fusion-welded corners for strength and energy efficiency
Integrated sash-to-sill interlock prevents bowing in extreme winds
Non-conductive composite reinforcement in meeting rails improves energy efficiency
True sloped sill creates efficient drainage to prevent water and debris accumulation
Hidden screen track for clean appearance
Single-hung windows also available with tilt-in bottom sash only
Double-hung base model upgraded to ST (steel reinforcement) for units over 48" wide or 84" high

images.relevance: Demonstrates the aesthetic appeal and real-world installation of the double-hung windows in a home setting

images.description: Lifestyle photo showing two children lying on a wooden floor in a room with double-hung windows and a lake view, demonstrating the easy-to-clean tilt feature
images.relevance: Illustrates the practical, family-friendly nature of the windows and their easy cleaning feature

page_summary: This appears to be a product catalog page showcasing double-hung windows with wood interior frames. The page demonstrates the windows in a living room setting and includes detail shots of window operation and hardware.
key_points: Double-hung windows with traditional grid/grille pattern design
Wood interior frames with warm honey/oak finish
Windows feature tilt-in functionality for easy cleaning
Hardware includes metal locking mechanism
Windows complement both traditional and transitional interior design styles

page_summary: Product page for Mezzo Sliding Windows, highlighting their sleek design, smooth operation, and energy-efficient features. The windows feature horizontal sliding sashes, weathertight construction, and convenient lift-out cleaning capability.
key_points: Mezzo Sliding Windows have a slim silhouette with ample glass area and smooth gliding action
Both sashes slide horizontally and lift out for convenient cleaning
Heavy-duty construction with weathertight fit for excellent performance
Narrowline frame with fusion-welded corners for strength and energy efficiency
Insulated glass unit with double-strength glass and warm-edge spacer system
Multi-chambered construction creates airtight insulating compartments
Non-conductive composite reinforcement in meeting rails
Nylon-encased dual brass roller system for easy-glide performance
Hidden screen track for clean appearance

images.relevance: Main hero image demonstrating the windows installed in a home setting, showcasing wide-open volume and natural light

page_summary: This is a product brochure page for Mezzo Picture Windows and Special Shapes, highlighting their versatility, quality construction, and design options. The page emphasizes the windows' narrowline frames, full glass exposure, and high-performance insulating components.
key_points: Picture windows offer versatility - can be used alone or combined with other window styles
Narrowline frame with fusion-welded corners provides exceptional beauty, strength, and energy efficiency
Insulated glass unit with double-strength glass and warm-edge spacer system for thermal protection
Embedded multi-chambered construction creates airtight insulating compartments
Available in multiple architectural styles: Circle Top, Quarter Arch, Eyebrow, Half Eyebrow, Ellipse, Full Circle, Hexagon, Octagon, Pentagon, Cathedral, Trapezoid, Triangle and more
Full glass exposure offers unobstructed outdoor views
High-performance insulating components protect against harsh weather and energy loss

page_summary: This page from a window catalog describes casement and awning windows, highlighting their design features, functionality, and benefits. It emphasizes the blend of traditional craftsmanship with modern window technology, describing both window types as offering utility, style, and practical features like easy operation and weather sealing.
key_points: Casement windows feature beveled exterior sash design for a larger glass appearance and slimline look
Step-down frame with compression-type inner bulb seal provides tight seal during inclement weather
State-of-the-art hinge system allows multi-directional ventilation and interior sash cleaning
Positive crank mechanism enables easy opening and closing operation
Multi-point locking system ensures tight seal and increased comfort
Multiple lite configurations available in a single mainframe for both window types
Awning windows feature heavy-duty hinge system for easy operation from inside
Awning windows have dual locking system on each side
Awning windows can combine with fixed lites for ventilation and increased visibility
Casement sash opens outward while awning window opens up and out

images.description: Interior room photo showing a large casement window with white frame overlooking trees, demonstrating the window in a living space setting
images.relevance: Shows practical application of casement window in home environment, highlighting the large glass area and natural light benefits

images.description: Interior room photo showing an awning window above a stone fireplace with decorative mirrors, in a cozy living room setting

page_summary: This product page showcases Bay, Bow & Garden Windows, highlighting their features and benefits for home improvement. The page describes how these window types can transform rooms and provides detailed specifications for both garden windows and bay/bow windows, including construction materials, glass options, and available finishes.
key_points: Garden windows feature fully welded mainframe for strength and stability
Clear 1" insulated glass unit provides all-weather protection
Top sloped insulating glass panel is tempered for increased durability
Multi-point locking system for tighter seal and added comfort
Garden windows available with white screens and hardware only
Bay and bow windows use 1-1/4" furniture-grade veneer for head, seatboard and jambs
Head and seatboard available in oak or birch veneer finishes for painting or staining
3" pre-insulated seatboard option available
Slimline reinforced mullion design
Bay and bow windows available in variety of colors and finishes
Exterior roof system available with optional copper or painted aluminum roof clad kits
Avonite seatboard options include Cameo, Beach, Sandstone, and Dusk colors

images.relevance: Demonstrates practical use of garden window for growing plants indoors and aesthetic appeal

images.relevance: Shows available seatboard finish options for bay and bow windows

page_summary: Product page for Mezzo Sliding Patio Doors featuring premium vinyl construction, energy-efficient glass, and multiple style options (Contemporary, Classic, and French). The page details construction features, available sizes, and handle finish options.
key_points: Premium vinyl mainframe and sash extrusions that won't chip, peel, crack or warp
Double-wall design with multi-chambered construction for increased strength
1" thick insulated glass with warm-edge spacer system for energy efficiency
Dual internal/external weatherstripping for optimal energy efficiency
Steel reinforcements at interlocks and lock rails
Precision-engineered tandem roller system for quiet operation
Heavy-duty extruded aluminum screen with four adjustable rollers
Available in 2-panel (5', 6', 8'), 3-panel (9', 12'), and 4-panel (12') configurations
Three distinctive styles: Contemporary, Classic, and French
Handle finishes available in White, Beige, Classic Clay, Bright Chrome, Brushed Chrome, Bright Brass, and Antique Brass

images.relevance: Marketing image demonstrating the 'naturally beautiful point of view' tagline and the door's connection to outdoor living

page_summary: This is a product catalog page showcasing three different styles of patio doors: Contemporary-Style, Classic-Style, and French-Style. Each door style is displayed in a room setting to demonstrate how they look when installed.
key_points: Contemporary-Style Patio Door features warm wood framing with minimal grid pattern
Classic-Style Patio Door has white framing with traditional multi-pane grid design
French-Style Patio Door offers white framing with vertical grid pattern and opens to a deck
All three styles provide views to outdoor garden/patio areas

page_summary: This page showcases the FrameWorks Color Collection from Mezzo, displaying available exterior and interior color options for windows and patio doors. The collection features polyurethane coating technology for exterior colors and woodgrain laminates for interior finishes.
key_points: Exterior colors feature heat-reflective pigments with polyurethane coating for fade-resistant finish
Interior woodgrain laminates are performance-engineered for durability

13 exterior color options available including Black, Architectural Bronze, American Terra, Hudson Khaki, Desert Clay, Sand Dune, English Red, Forest Green, Silver, Castle Gray, Classic Clay, Beige, and White
9 interior color options including White Woodgrain, Rich Maple Woodgrain, Light Oak Woodgrain, Dark Oak Woodgrain, Foxwood Woodgrain, Cherry Woodgrain, Classic Clay, Beige, and White
White woodgrain is only available with Beige or Classic Clay base
Classic Clay base is not available with exterior color finishes
Hardware color varies based on interior finish selection (matching, Pontiac Gold, or Brown)

page_summary: This page presents design options for windows, including decorative grid patterns, grid profiles in various colors and finishes, V-grooved cut glass options, simulated divided lites, and Trimworks exterior trim system options.
key_points: Contoured colonial grids available in 3/4" and 1" profiles with complementary colors and matching woodgrains
All grids are enclosed within the insulated glass unit for easy cleaning
Five grid pattern styles available: Colonial, Diamond, Craftsman, Prairie, and Double Prairie
Flat Grids available in Colonial, Diamond, Craftsman, Prairie and Double Prairie patterns
Contoured Grids available in Colonial, Craftsman, Prairie and Double Prairie patterns
1" contoured colonial grids are not available in matching woodgrains
V-grooved cut glass available in Colonial and Prairie patterns from Mezzo Windows and Alside Patio Doors
Simulated Divided Lites combine historical window design with modern energy efficiency
Trimworks Exterior Trim System offers custom fabricated exterior casing and brickmould options
Flat Casing available with and without bullnose sill
Brickmould available in 1-1/2" and 3/4" profiles

page_summary: This is a marketing page from Alside promoting their Mezzo Windows, emphasizing peace of mind through their lifetime limited warranty and eco-friendly/green features. The page highlights the company's commitment to quality, energy efficiency, and environmental sustainability.
key_points: Mezzo Windows are backed by Alside's Lifetime Limited Warranty, one of the strongest in the industry
Optional glass breakage warranty available
FrameWorks Color Collection exterior finishes carry a 10-year fade-resistance warranty
Windows are energy-smart and weathertight, reducing fuel consumption for heating and cooling
Long service life with optimal material use and minimal production waste
Virtually all in-plant vinyl scrap is recycled into other useful products
Vinyl resin is derived largely from common salt, described as a sustainable natural resource
Products are AAMA certified and meet IGCC (Insulating Glass Certification Council) standards
Company located at 3773 State Road, Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio 44223
